pullrequest.title: Change train_windows (in minibatch) to sort in reverse, such that the last index will not be greater than 9999

content.raw:
That was my original comment on here and I asked for your input on here (I'm not sure what happened to the comment). It seems like an unlikely case but not impossible to happen. It's more likely to occur depending on smaller split sequences and larger fractions for minibatch.

I'm not sure what the best solution is here. A trivial solution would be to resample the windows until your smallest index was less than 9999.
content.html:
That was my original comment on here and I asked for your input on here (I'm not sure what happened to the comment). It seems like an unlikely case but not impossible to happen. It's more likely to occur depending on smaller split sequences and larger fractions for minibatch.

I'm not sure what the best solution is here. A trivial solution would be to resample the windows until your smallest index was less than 9999.
